plot: In the early 90's, an iconic photo of a boy dropping in on a huge unknown wave made the cover of Surfing Life. 20 years later, the boy the world had never heard of earned the chance to compete against the best surfer the world has ever seen
title: Waverider
plot_es: In the early 90's, an iconic photo of a boy dropping in on a huge unknown wave made the cover of Surfing Life. 20 years later, the boy the world had never heard of earned the chance to compete against the best surfer the world has ever seen
